data.subject: Born Again Tomorrow (Live From The London Palladium / 2016)
data.lyric:
If you were born again tomorrow
 
 This ain't a test, no it's a warning
 Ain't gonna say the sky is

data.subject: Labor Of Love (Live From The London Palladium / 2016)
data.lyric:
Smoke stack blowing, there's a fire in the sky
 Fahrenheit rising, oh, higher than high
 Pressure's

data.subject: Knockout (Live From The London Palladium / 2016)
data.lyric:
Everyday I wake up with my back against the wall
 Anytime you get up someone wants to see you fall

data.subject: Living With The Ghost (Live From The London Palladium / 2016)
data.lyric:
Marry me to the blue sky
 Bury me in that long last drop of hard rain
 Meet me where they stop time

data.subject: This House Is Not For Sale (Live From The London Palladium / 2016)
data.lyric:
These four walls have got a story to tell
 The door is off the hinges, there's no wish in the well
